Bat.description:
I am a Creature from the 
darkest depths of 
your mind!!!
Bat.attack:
The bat sinks its fangs into 
your noggin
Bat.dead: This bat is an ex-bat now

Rat.description:
I am not as useless as 
you may think!
Rat.attack:
The rat sinks its mangy teeth 
into your arm

Cat.attack:
The cat flails around and nicks 
your skin
Cat.dead: The cat got bored and walked off

Le Boss.dead:
The boss wasn't invincible enough 
to beat you
